content: आरोहः [आ-रुह्-घञ्] {@--1@} One who mounts, a rider, as in अश्वारोह, स्यंदनारोह; सारोहाणां च वाजिनां <ls>Rām.</ls>; one who is seated in a carriage. {@--2@} Ascent, rising, mounting, ascending, riding. {@--3@} An elevated place, elevation, altitude, height; नगाद्यारोह उच्छ्रायः <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--4@} Haughtiness, pride. {@--5@} A mountain, a heap. {@--6@} A woman's waist; the buttocks; सा रामा न वरारोहा <ls>Udb.</ls>; आरोहैर्निबिडबृहन्नितंबबिंबैः <ls>Śi. 8. 8.</ls> {@--7@} Length. {@--8@} A kind of measure. {@--9@} A mine. {@--10@} Descending.
